html:
Salary Slip/{{ doc.name }}
Employee: {{ doc.employee_name }} Start Date: {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.start_date) }}
Designation: {{ doc.designation }} End Date: {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.end_date) }}
Department: {{ doc.department }} Working Days: {{ doc.total_working_days }}
Bank Name: {{ doc.bank_name }} Leave Without Pay: {{ doc.leave_without_pay or 0 }}
Bank A/C No: {{ doc.bank_account_no }} Payment Days: {{ doc.payment_days }}
PAN Number: {{ doc.pan_number }}
{% for earning in doc.earnings %} {% endfor %}
EARNINGS
Component Amount
{{ earning.salary_component }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(earning.amount) }}
{% for deduction in doc.deductions %} {% endfor %}
DEDUCTIONS
Component Amount
{{ deduction.salary_component }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(deduction.amount) }}
Gross Pay {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.gross_pay) }}
Total Deduction {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total_deduction) }}
Net Pay {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.net_pay) }}
Rounded Total {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.rounded_total) }}
Total in Words {{ doc.total_in_words }}
This is a computer-generated salary slip, hence no signature is required.
name: Salary Slip Standard
